block.p: FATWIRE, Mineola, N.Y., a software technology company, named Frank Russo chief operating officer. He had been president for North American operations at New Era of Networks.

HUMMER WINBLAD VENTURE PARTNERS, San Francisco, named Chuck Robel general partner and chief operating officer. He had been managing partner at the Silicon Valley transaction services group of PricewaterhouseCoopers.
FATWIRE, Mineola, N.Y., a software technology company, named Frank Russo chief operating officer. He had been president for North American operations at New Era of Networks.

HUMMER WINBLAD VENTURE PARTNERS, San Francisco, named Chuck Robel general partner and chief operating officer. He had been managing partner at the Silicon Valley transaction services group of PricewaterhouseCoopers.
SUBARU OF AMERICA, Cherry Hill, N.J., named Takao Saito, chairman and chief executive, to the additional post of president, succeeding George Muller, who is leaving.
